oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Business people; Portraits
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A black and white portrait of J.W. Thomas. Underneath is his signature and two sets of dates: "Mar.30-1880 to June 30-1880; Sept. 10-1884 to Feb.12-1906."
J.W. Thomas served as President of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition.
